> FORAGING Rift Scuttlers now eat nearby Honeyfruit. If you kill them while they’re eating, you have no heart.

Scuttle Crab can have the Honeyfruit.

They will just make the crab more delicious.
That's just mean :c

actually, crab + honey produces a toxin that is a slow poison to the human body.

So all humanoids will now take DOT, while those from the void can enjoy the new gourmet.
scuttle crab can eat honeyfruit, but graves cant have a cigar?

Please give us more URF Rito, it is my favorite game mode by far

whats Nemesis Draft?
Im glad that they r bringing Nexus Siege back! Thats a FUN game MODE

A game mode where you had a traditional banning phase then one at a time chose champions for the enemy team to play regardless if they owned them. After the pick phase you could trade with teammates. Usually you saw a lot of supports in it and non-meta champs people thought were bad and then realized they were still strong champions.. My groups strategy was to give the enemy team all ADCs with no AP ratios then build pure tank and {{item:3075}} and we won every time.

Edit: We made sure they didn't have {{champion:67}} or {{champion:29}} because even though they fit our no AP ratios (Ik twitch does but the damage is still physical) they could shred tanks anyway.

No one uses Ghost.
They buff Ghost.
People use Ghost.
Riot complains people are using Ghost.
Riot nerfs Ghost.
{{champion:75}} The cycle of buffs and nerfs continues.
we will nerf. they will cry.

Knight's Vow isn't seeing barely any use just because Redemption is better than it, it's because it has an incredibly ugly build route and gives _absolutely pitiful_ stats unless you're always with the person you're bound to — and even when you're with them, it's not giving you all of what you'd actually want as a support.

The fact that it doesn't have a Kindle Gem instead of one of its Crystalline Bracers is a huge problem. Tank supports suffer reaching even 30% CDR with actual tank support items because they don't really _have_ any that give CDR, now that Locket's been shifted to "I give trash for stats but my active is awesome" and Banner is actually a joke item. Being forced into getting Ionian boots when you're a tank, especially one that's reliant on diving in (hi Leona) feels like crap.

I totally agree, I main support but I avoid the tanks because their build routes are trash right now, we need CDR but the tanky support items don't have it so we're forced to take Face of the Mountain, frozen heart, iceborn gauntlet, and the like, even on champs who would benefit more from locket, knights vow, etc. I'm really hoping the change to Eye of the Equinox will help a bit, but I'd love to see knight's vow changed to include kindlegem in place of a crystalline bracer, it just fits more with what we need as supports.

> When an Azir kills another Azir with a different skin, the dying Azir no longer steals his killer's skin's death animation particles

If it were any champion but Azir I'd be surprised

I feel as though they are nerfing jungle to the ground. {{summoner:3}} 
Could we please get a little something in return ? As a jungle main lately I have seen how brutal it already was. Then the experience nerf came... and I aswell as my friends were struggling to keep up with the bot lane in experience. Junglers such as {{champion:113}}  already have issues with sustain at early levels in jungle. and now with this new nerf to junglers... I don't see how junglers will be able to sustain to farm... let alone sustain enough to actually gank a lane. Unless you are playing {{champion:5}} , or fast camp clear/sustain junglers {{champion:77}} , {{champion:102}} . Alot of other junglers will fall off this patch. I hope you have something in return for us junglers in the next patch.
I feel as though a basic nerf to all junglers is to bland. They need to work a way to nerf the "god tier" junglers without hurting the ones that are already struggling.
like poor Kindred :( I would main Kin, but the current jungle and no more heal doesn't let Kin sustain AT ALL. I main Volibear now, but please do something to save Kindred {{champion:203}}

Considering all of the best meta junglers currently build {{item:1412}}  (or some variation), that would be a better place to look. Instead, junglers that are already too weak to be meta just got pushed out even further.

Riot removes the smite buffs, (practiclly the only reason we smited the camp), smite gives hp now (that fine). Riot proceeds to force us to use it on the first camp with a smaller leash even though you'll be nearly full hp (3/4ish) and wasting our smite to use it on the insane birds that will leave you at 1/6th of your hp..... GOOD CHOICES RIOT, GOOD CHOICES......

I was actually going to post something on the boards saying how you cant give a proper leash because no matter what youll miss minions when you go back to lane... they just made it worse....

Wolves dont give level 2, birds give it before u finish the camp, jungle was reinvented to give diversity to clear paths so that it isnt one "ideal" path for any/all champs and yet they are restricting two camps from spawning, as i said wolves dont give lvl 2, you cant start birds in case someone take sthe creep "accidentally" so u have to start at the buffs... Poor decision making, i used to be a jg main, i hate the jg now, (make notice that im not complaining about plants, thats cuz that was the only decent thing they came up with [smite heal too but they just made it useless early])

And by ading all these monsters in the preseason, they made the hit boxes for them very small to click on, i play the game on 18 average fps, so you can understand that, that is very frustrating when i cant click on camps because they are too small. 

IF RIOT DIDNT WANT SMITELESS LEASHES< THEN THEY SHOULDNT HAVE MADE SMITE GIVE HP, which is useless on the first camp and more effective on the second or third.

Vision wouldnt be an issue if the champions tehy came out with now a days didnt have everything in their kits.... MAKE WEAKNESSES, camille has sustain, dmg, basic attack amplifier, mobility, aoe, weak and hard cc (three total [slow, stun and her ult]), and many other champs are similar. Jglers wouldnt be overpowering early game if the champions were more balanced for everyone's enjoyment. 

SUGGESTION: instead of later camp times, give everyone two wards on purchase, instead of just the one. (simpler solution, changes much less, and is overall more positive [u get more, not less])

Also, honeyfruit is usable by everyone, if they dont want the jglers to take it, they cant take it themselves, at about 5-6 min they should be low-ish on mana or health. delaying their spawn time is reducing the efficiency of ap junglers/ ap champs that are going to the jg. Many ap junglers benefited from these juice-filled plants in order to sustain through the jg dmg since they lack sustain (unlike most recent ad champs u released.......)

This all said, the jg has now become an AOE battlefield restrciting your choices further...

This game is supposed to be progressing .... not regressing
Didn't disagree with a single change while scrolling through, but then I noticed I had reached the end and Jayce wasn't even acknowledged. He should be looked at.
This patch (and 7.1) were locked before they realized Jace needed the nerfs that bad. Substantial Nerfs for him and Camillie are already up on 7.3
Damn i was hoping for the practice mode :(
when they mean early 2017 they mean late 2017

Any word on changing control wards vision radius to what pinks were. Honestly makes it hard to know when it should see certain spots or not. Like a little more clarity(I know you guys love that word) would be great. Did I miss a hot fix or something.

RIP any jungler who isn't Vi/Lee/Hec/Kha/Rengar. Riot's too busy insisting the entire role's broken and systematically crippling weak junglers to actually care about you. You will be missed, but not by Riot.
